name: Room (Fun-Damental)
description:
You find yourself in the strange facility with paper left by somebody unknown.

But where is this place?How do you get here?

There are so many doubts but you have no time to think.

According to the  unknown,you're not safe if you stay here.

So you know the only thing you should do immediately is finding the way to leave.

Controls:
  • WASD to walk
  • shift+WASD  to run
  • ctrl to crouch
  • space to jump
  • E to interact

Welcome to share feelings and thoughts in comments  : )
